name: Crystal Shot
description:
Shoot enemies while relaxing to beautiful music in the background

◆Stunning streamlined visuals invite you into a whole new world!
◆Soothing sounds play to the beat of your gameplay, making for both an engaging and relaxing experience!
◆Controls are simple - all you have to do to play is tap! Everything depends on your ability to concentrate.
◆More than 100 stages are available in total! And frequent updates means there's no shortage of fun to have!
◆Plenty of higher difficulty modes are waiting for the bravest of players! Record yourself and show your skills off to your friends!
